alfredsnippet.snippet:
def plot_pointplots(df,ys):
    fig = plt.figure(figsize=(12,8))
    colors = ['r','g','b','c','m','y','k']
    linestyles = ['-','--'] * len(ys)
    for i in range(len(ys)):
        plt.plot(df.index, df[ys[i]],
                color=colors[i],
                marker='o',
                linestyle=linestyles[i])

    plt.ylabel()
    plt.xlabel()
    plt.xticks(rotation=90)
    plt.title()
    plt.legend()
    plt.show()
alfredsnippet.name: plot pointplots
